### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (41.0, -82.0)) 
-  Chest (position (40.5, -83.5)) 
-  Chest (position (41.5, -83.5)) 
-  Burner inserter (position (39.5, -81.5)) 

### Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) 

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when chest at drop position is full
- Empty the chest at the specified position to continue mining.
### Errors when no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt.

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
